history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: Forall_rect. qsimpl time: 1 use: Forall_rect.

exceptions.tactic: apply (Forall_rect _ (fun x => x <> 1 /\ (forall y, y < x -> y = 1 \/ y = x)) _).
exceptions.exn: In environment l : list nat Unable to unify "nat -> Prop" with "Forall prime l -> 1 <= lprod l".

exceptions.tactic: intros b l' Hprime Pl' IH.

exceptions.exn: Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.
The reference Hprime was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hneq was not found in the current environment.
The reference IH was not found in the current environment.

original: apply (Forall_rect _ (fun x => x <> 1 /\ (forall y, y < x -> y = 1 \/ y = x)) _). - simpl. auto. - intros b l' Hprime Pl' IH. simpl. split. -- destruct Hprime as [Hneq _]. apply Hneq. -- intros y Hy. destruct (IH (Forall_inv_tail _ _ _ Pl')) as [_ Hy'].
